docs.title: Cargo Cult Data-Ops
docs.text:
conventions (presented without justification)

  • YODA
  • Version control
    • atomic
    • conventional commits (vs. gitmoji)
    • pre-commit hooks
      • lint/fmt
      • test
  • Container-ize (docker, nix)
  • Provenance tracking
  • Automate
